name: 122420351.GitHub.io
body:
# What is rural GSM?
Rural GSM product focus on rural and remote places where infrastructure is unavailable,the main target market is isolated island & undeveloped countryside like some places in India and Africa  .
Rural GSM is an normal GSM network including Radio Access Network and Core Network.But it's different from the traditional GSM network,especially for the Raido Access Network(RAN).A rural site may be short of power(only solar power is available),lack of backhaul connection and satellite maybe the only choice most of the time,low population,low ARPU,etc...All of these factors affect the RAN product.A Rural GSM ,here we mainly refer to RAN(BTS and BSC) should be easy deployment & low cost & high stability & power saving & bandwidth saving.

# Who are we?
The team comes from Altobridge(Closed by Intel due to financial issue in 2014) which was the  Top 1 rural GSM solution provider.We know deeply of the whole GSM network(Both RAN and CoreNetwork),our RAN and CN products are deployed commercially all over the world and running stably.We are Afarcom,www.afarcom.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
